questions.questionText: Select the items that are important when speaking on the telephone
answerOptions: Speak loud to emphasize your points
Use a deeper tone of voice
Use a tone that shows authority and intelligence
Give your sales pitch to the gatekeeper
answer: Use a deeper tone of voice
Use a tone that shows authority and intelligence

questions.questionText: What should your main attitude be when you pick up the telephone?
What percentage of your impact comes from the words you choose?
When talking to a gatekeeper, it is often best to let them lead the conversation

If a prospect tries to rush you, it means they are very busy and you should shorten your pitch; there will be more opportunities to talk to them, and you risk ruining the relationship right off the bat
You should tell your life story to the gatekeeper, who absolutely wants to hear it
A good meeting leaves room for agility and flexibility rather than assigning rigid goals, deadlines, or tasks
It's better to have a 'to do' list than to plan out each hour of your day
